title: GTA 6 RUMORS SPEED UP, HOGWARTS LEGACY MICROTRANSACTIONS CLARIFIED, & MORE
description:
Thanks to Keeps for sponsoring this video! Head to https://keeps.com/gameranx to get 50% off your first Keeps order.

A new Grand Theft Auto 6 rumor, an spiritual successor/sequel to Until Dawn, Elden Ring is a surprise hit, and more in a week full of gaming news.

title: Steam Deck - Before You Buy
description:
Valve's Steam Deck portable gaming PC device is finally here! How is it? Will it play all of your favorite Steam games? Let's talk.
Subscribe for more: http://youtube.com/gameranxtv ▼▼


Watch more 'Before You Buy': https://bit.ly/2kfdxI6

#SteamDeck
